get.summary: Versions of this package and its first-party dependencies

post.summary:
Generate a token for a grant flow.
Implements https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc6749#section-4.1.3
Logout a user (uses provided Bearer token from Header)

get.summary: Shows secret to authenticated user (uses provided Bearer token from Header)

client_id.description: optional client ID (as used, for example, in RFC6749's non password non refresh grant flow)

client_secret.description: optional client secret (as used, e.g., in RFC6749's non (password|refresh) grant flow)

password.description: optional password (as used, for example, in RFC6749's password grant flow)

refresh_token.description: optional refresh token (as used, for example, in RFC6749's refresh grant flow)

username.description: optional username (as used, for example, in RFC6749's password grant flow)
